author: Lobo_da_boss_
title: The first set I technically got on its official release date (17 March 2021)
review:
Opening;

The Emperor (aka Sheev Palpatine/Darth Sidious) is star wars' biggest villain (not most iconic , but biggest) and Lego have notoriously done him justice in figure form, but let's see how he holds up using the newer style hood piece released on triple force Friday 2019 in the latest issue of the Lego star wars magazine .

The Minifigure-

The figure isn't exclusive as everything included came in the 75291 Death Star final duel , he has the newer hood piece included in black (previously only coming in 3 sets) , the usual modern Palpatine head in light tan with a content and an angry face with both having the deep scaring he received in ep 3 and his yellow Sith eyes , a softer style black cape and his Sith robe detailing from his torso to his legs .

The accessory -

His singular included accessory is one of his lightsabers with the trans red blade and pearl gold hilt , however the content of the magazine indicates that this is an ep 6 based set and he loses both of his lightsabers in ep 3 but oh well it's nice to get it anyway despite lightning having been more accurate .

In conclusion -

this is a decent figure , but I am not crazy for the newer hood , as it looks too tall to me and I think that at least one lightning piece should have been included as well to more appropriately depict his ep 6 form but overall I recommend it to current non Palpatine figure owners .
